node.excerpt: As Gavin and I have started exploring Virtual Reality as a platform, we’ve been doing a lot of thought experiments. It’s a whole new medium…

frontmatter.title: Virtual Anaglyphs
frontmatter.excerpt: Exploring Virtual Reality as a platform has led to a lot of thought experiments. It's a whole new medium and working against a medium's expectations is where the real fun is.

node.excerpt: The Oculus Quest is entirely immersive and a blast to play with. Of course, the moment I put it on, I immediately wanted to make my own…

frontmatter.title: Developing for the Oculus Quest
frontmatter.excerpt: Everyone wants to talk about consumer VR. I just want to make some games.
